CustomField.description: Ticked where a Status update is required by the Status Scheduled Flow. This could be where Status needs updating to In Progress or to Overdue.
CustomField.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type__c,"Fixed-Term"), TEXT(Status__c) != 'Complete', OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"In Progress"), Due_Date__c < TODAY() ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Overdue"), Due_Date__c > TODAY() ) ) )
CustomField.label: System: Trigger Status Scheduled Flow
